en-US.name: Facts a Day: Fun Daily Trivia
en-US.subtitle: Fun Facts & Brain Quiz Game
en-US.promotionalText: New facts every day! Expand your knowledge, challenge yourself with trivia, and become the smartest person in the room. Pick your favorite topics and start learning.
en-US.description:
Did you know? Fun facts are the fastest way to get smarter!

Facts a Day delivers fascinating random facts from science, history, nature, space, psychology, and 12 more topics — beautifully designed with stunning images. Challenge yourself with brain quiz games, track your IQ progress, and become the smartest person in the room.

WHY YOU'LL LOVE IT

• Daily Fun Facts — Fresh, interesting, and amazing facts every single day
• 17 Categories — Science, History, Space, Nature, Psychology, Technology, Arts, Geography, Health, Business, Philosophy, Language, Sports, Food, Environment, Culture, and Mathematics
• Beautiful Cards — Each fact comes with a stunning image
• Brain Quiz Game — 3 trivia game modes to test your IQ and knowledge
• Track Your Genius — See your stats, streaks, badges, and accuracy
• Save Favorites — Build your personal knowledge library
• Works Offline — Read saved facts and play quizzes without internet
• 8 Languages — English, Spanish, French, German, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, and Turkish

HOW IT WORKS

1. Pick your favorite topics — choose from 17 knowledge categories
2. Get fun random facts delivered daily
3. Read, save, and share cool facts that interest you
4. Test yourself with brain trivia games
5. Watch your knowledge and IQ grow!

TRIVIA GAME MODES

• Daily Trivia — Questions based on facts you've seen today
• Mixed Trivia — Random challenge across all categories
• Category Mastery — Focus on what you love and become a genius

DID YOU KNOW?

Every day, our curious users discover amazing facts about science, history, space, animals, psychology, and more. Whether you love random trivia, brain teasers, riddles, or general knowledge quizzes — Facts a Day has something for you.

Perfect for curious minds, lifelong learners, and anyone who loves a good quiz. A few minutes a day makes you smarter — guaranteed.

Download now — it's free to start!

Payment will be charged to your App Store account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions in your App Store account settings.

Her gün, meraklı kullanıcılarımız bilim, tarih, uzay, hayvanlar, psikoloji ve daha fazlası hakkında şaşırtıcı bilgiler keşfediyor. Rastgele trivia, beyin oyunları, bulmacalar veya genel kültür quizleri seviyorsan — Günlük Bilgi tam sana göre.
